name: Weon
body:
**### Welcome to WeOn Software.**

![](http://www.weon.mx/img/logo-weon.png)

WeOn is a open source software that offers free wifi in the public bus.
which have the following features:
    * Analyze data and generate information on urban mobility and transport.
    * Two-way communication between passengers and the transport provider.
    * Generate solutions for public transport.
    * Generate service surveys.
    * Offer free Internet to passengers.


### Authors and Contributors
Weon project was founded by Paco de Aguinaga <francisco@weon.mx>.
WeOn Software was developing by Paul Barajas <paul.barajas@linux.com>.

### Support or Contact
Please visit our web page for support http://www.weon.mx/
